website_summaries.verdict: Good price for a 500-count set of paintballs. Pink shell and aqua fill stand out from the crowd.
pros: Bright fill color ensures you can see your strike marks clearly
A decent option for recreational shooting
cons: Several reports of paintballs arriving broken in the bag

customer_reviews.title: XBALL CERTIFIED MIDNIGHT AQUA PAINTBALLS
customer_reviews.text: They seem durable and I like the 2shade blue shell color and aqua fill. Also got no broken paintballs in the bag when I received them BUT 75 or 80 percent of them had dimples some worse than others. Bought a bag of 500 and plan on using them for target practice and velocity adjustments. Hopefully they can handle a 98 flatline! 🙏 Update they work wonders in my TIPPMANN 98 PS ACT with flat line barrel. For the price they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: No solicitors.
customer_reviews.text: I like my piece and quite. I don't like unwanted guests opening my gate . and now he knows I don't want his yard service. They work great !
customer_reviews.author: daniel Bokuvka

customer_reviews.title: No breaks, paintballs look and shoot fine
customer_reviews.text: Paintballs are of good quality and firm. No breaks in the bag. Shoot fine, gone through about 30 or so. I had concerns with images and experiences from other reviews but I guess it’s a hit or miss when you get a bag of paintballs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tsui

customer_reviews.title: Broken paint balls
customer_reviews.text: Just got the paint balls today and there broken!!! I bought them for a gift and now I have to get a replacement. Hopefully the new box doesn't look like that!! =(
customer_reviews.author: Sharlett B.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with numerous paintballs broken in package.
customer_reviews.text: Opened the shipping box up to find several paintballs in the package broken and there was no damage to the shipping box . Sent them back right away. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: A.T.

customer_reviews.title: Paintballs
customer_reviews.text: I could not use most of them the bags came in and alot of them were busted causing them to all stick together. Tried to pull them apart and they just busted more.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha hixon

customer_reviews.title: Broken Balls in Bag
customer_reviews.text: First order came with multiple broken balls, returned. Second order came with broken balls also.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: GI sports balls great product
customer_reviews.text: Very low usage for this product as we live in the country. Mainly used to keep varmits out of the garden. Excellent product, arrived intact, very well packaged. None broken.
customer_reviews.author: kencblue

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: Only have 1 star because I had to... more then half of them we're broken and they are really crappy quality. Would return them but can't really return liquid...
customer_reviews.author: lauryl borgstrom

customer_reviews.title: All in all no problems, great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, shaking around the bag feels so satisfying, no problems, I was scared that it was going to have broken paintballs but none, I think why some people did is because it was probably in a hot environment. I give this app 5 stars but the shipping was terrible it arrived 2 days late, but that’s not the company who makes this problem or the product itself. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: expect to wash them
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. Expect a bunch of broken ones. I washed them in a pan of water and the unbroken ones are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan F

customer_reviews.title: PAINTBALLS COME SQUISHED AND DESTROYED
customer_reviews.text: The package came and every paintball in the bag was broken. They were all soft and almost all of them had broken open. When I opened the bag, all the paintballs had merged into one large mush of paint and soft paintball casings. I am very disappointed with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Christmas morning was a blast with my brothers and I using these things. They held up nicely and cleaned up after the next rainy day.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P. Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: They go splat
customer_reviews.text: Use these out of a pump pistol and they go splat each time
customer_reviews.author: Harshman Hills

customer_reviews.title: After the tedious hour spent on cleaning them from broken ones in ...
customer_reviews.text: After the tedious hour spent on cleaning them from broken ones in the package, shot the remaining 490 with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Zach Orth

customer_reviews.title: None popped
customer_reviews.text: 500 count came in clean af. No pops. Used about 130 balls all went through my marker no pops. Update: used them all, not a single ball broke in my marker. Will buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler C.

customer_reviews.title: When it arrived a lot of the rounds were popped ...
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived a lot of the rounds were popped which ruined a lot of the balls and caused the gun to jam... not really the manufacturers fault but could find a way to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Harris Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Very good just over priced
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed them. I shot all of them out of the tippmann A-5 with no breaks or jams. The only reason I'm giving this anything less than 5 stars is that I ended up finding the same pruduct at Walmart for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Kane Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Paintballs showed up partially broken and many were dented and misshapen
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Multiple broken paintballs in the bag when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed got the paintballs in two bags with a bunch of balls already broken.
customer_reviews.author: La pola

customer_reviews.title: A desaster
customer_reviews.text: The paint balls that where not busted where coated with sticky paint, totally unusable ,both 500 round packs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good paintballs
customer_reviews.text: Good for what they are. Accurate enough for non-competitive paint.
customer_reviews.author: Brinjölfur Owens

customer_reviews.title: Broken paint like crazy
customer_reviews.text: When I had received the box it was covered in paint on the inside and 2 of the bags were blown open and paint everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Acacio alves

customer_reviews.title: POOR SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Balls seem fine, slightly thin shell. About 20 broken balls. Poor shipping from amazon prime
customer_reviews.author: aaron h.

customer_reviews.title: Need more to your packaging wasn’t good
customer_reviews.text: All the paintballs were popped and paint was all over
customer_reviews.author: nelly

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of the balls were busted and the bag was full of paint! Total mess, very frustrating...very bummed out kid on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: For my friends Gender Reveal we were shooting her boyfriend with paintballs with the color inside. So disappointed when the balls did not break on impact
customer_reviews.author: Anis Solorio

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Every ball busted in the gun upon firing Tippman custom pro with e-trigger and 22" barrel.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Balls repetitively exploded in my chamber. Terrible and bad quality.... DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfectly not damaged at all. Product works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Mireya Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of broken paint
customer_reviews.text: Both bags contained multiple broken paintballs and the contents were covered in paint. Unusable until moved to separate containers and cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Craig

customer_reviews.title: Paintballs came broken and leaking
customer_reviews.text: 90% of the paintballs were cracked/broken. Shipping box was not damaged. Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Paintballs broken in sealed package
customer_reviews.text: The shipping boxed looked well done but when opened alot of them were broken..
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great gift highly recommend this buyer
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts & everthing came as planned & on time 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

product_meta.title: GI Sportz XBALL Certified Midnight Paintballs - Shell Varies
product_meta.description: Midnight Paintballs are designed for use in recreational paintball, but they are still dependable and rarely break up in a marker. The fill from the Midnight paintballs washes easily off your paintball gear and the shells of this ball is durable enough so that it won't break in your paintball gun.
feature_bullets: Great for Tournament Practice, Scenario Games or General Play

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
